sentences.en: "So what do you think?" she said in a hoarse whisper.
sentences.cn: “那么你怎么认为？”她用嘶哑的嗓音悄声说道。

sentences.en: Hand in hand, classmates sing themselves hoarse.
sentences.cn: 手牵手，同学们嘶哑地歌唱。

sentences.en: Their voices were hoarse, but they began yelling again.
sentences.cn: 他们的声音沙哑，但又开始喊叫起来。
